Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Been there last Friday with a group of friends and loved the cozy vibes. They had a DJ playing some music, beer is good and the chairs are amazing, our table was on the stage and we had big armchairs for seats. Had a great time!

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Young and artistic environment, vintage atmospheric, simple and nice service, good food, too (especially aubergine & lentils)

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Love this little find! Very pretty interiors (funky, vintage), great food, and a nice place to have a beer outside during a sunny day! I heard sometimes they host game nights and live music. I‚Äôll definitely come back üëç

Name: Tolbar
Review Text:
Super chill and cozy bar near the Amstel river just outside of the city centre. No whiskey! But they did have bourbon,
so close enough on a winter night. Similar layout to OT301 with both tables and chairs & couches.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Fantastic little restaurant hidden away in the Pijp. Great atmosphere, delicious burritos, huge selection and beers and friendly staff. What else cook under you possibly want? Great recipe for a perfect evening.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text:
Smallest kitchen of Amsterdam ;) Wide beers selection, tasty burgers and sandwiches, cool staff, cozy and easygoing spot :)
Stuff happen to be inattentive and scrubbing around. But still nice

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Hidden gem. Lovely sunny terrace, friendly service and very good food.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Super cool place! Very nice atmosphere for beers and drinks! Snacks are also recommended.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Best bar on the Tolstraat hands-down

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Excellent place, yet typical Dutch service!

Name: Tolbar
Review Text:
Very slow service!! We had to wait 30 mins for a beer.
The lunch ‚Äúsuper toast‚Äù 6‚Ç¨ was a  piece of bread and cheese.
Totally not worth it.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Excellent choice of tap and bottle beers with very attentive staff. Seems 'old school room' furniture is everywhere in Amsterdam bars and eateries these days. 3rd place in 2 days with this style but still a great locals bar just a very short a hop from the Pestana hotel.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Really great food and drinks for decent price. Bar is kind of lost in a part of the Pijp where a lot of construction are happening. Nonetheless the quiet atmosphere et and nice terrasse are really a big plus. I would come back for sure because the inside seems pretty nice just to sit and work with labtop!

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: This is a hidden gem! It's a very relaxed environment, very much like spots around NDSM in Amsterdam Noord. The food is excellent.  They have a cool selection of beers. The staff is fantastic! You'll feel comfortable working on your laptop there. Zero pretentiousness. Now, don't tell too many people about this amazing little spot!

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Hidden gem in the Pijp with a living room atmosphere. Awesome staff and great artsy audience. Great beer selection and tasty no-frills food. The terrace is great in the summer.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: A need to have been there place in Amsterdam

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Very fun neighborhood spot. Cozy but cool vibes, great beer options and good food as well. Lots of games and seating available too.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Very friendly staff and nice beers

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Cosy bar with a lovely interior and nice terrace in the summer. Grab a Thai Thai and play cards until 3am üÉè! Check the Cinetol in the hall for some random concerts with cheap entrance.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Lovely neighborhood student pub that serves tasty food and stays open late. Good beer selection, and low prices prices.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Super friendly and very easy going, with tasty beer collection and a young crowd, a hidden gem right now still!

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Good local low key bar, an decent enough burger and you can normally find a spot on the terrace.

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: Good music and some good brews on the menu. A place that is very reasonably priced for its attributes !

Name: Tolbar
Review Text: food here is absolutely brilliant we think but just a drink at the terrace is just as nice

Name: Tolbar
